statements: SELECT * FROM user_roles
SELECT role, user_id FROM user_roles
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id < 100;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) FROM user_roles GROUP BY role HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT role, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, role FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_info DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_info LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data_info FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, s.data_info FROM users u INNER JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.role = 'Member';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM sensitive_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM role LIMIT 5
SELECT username FROM user WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE id = 2
SELECT role_name FROM role
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, s.data FROM user u JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.id JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.id = s.id
SELECT r.role_name, u.username FROM role r JOIN user u ON r.id = u.role_id ORDER BY r.role_name DESC
SELECT s.data, r.role_name, u.username FROM sensitive_data s JOIN user u ON s.id = u.id JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.id
SELECT r.role_name, COUNT(u.id) AS user_count FROM role r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.id = u.role_id GROUP BY r.role_name
SELECT u.username, s.data FROM user u LEFT JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.id = s.id WHERE s.id IS NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT data_id, data_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT data_id, data_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 2 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, sr.user_id FROM users u JOIN user_roles sr ON u.user_id = sr.user_id JOIN roles r ON sr.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(sr.role_id) AS num_roles FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles sr ON u.user_id = sr.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(sr.role_id) >= 2 ORDER BY num_roles DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_info WHERE level = 'high' ORDER BY info_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id
SELECT u.username, si.info FROM users u JOIN user_sensitive_info_view usiv ON u.user_id = usiv.user_id JOIN sensitive_info si ON usiv.info_id = si.info_id WHERE si.level = 'confidential'

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, si.info FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_sensitive_info_view usiv ON u.user_id = usiv.user_id JOIN sensitive_info si ON usiv.info_id = si.info_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin'
